mapper.select: select commentid, commentuserid, commenttime, imageid, comment, userid, nickname from `comments`,`user` where imageid = #{imageid} and comments.commentuserid = user.userid
select commentid, commentuserid, commenttime, imageid, comment, userid, nickname from `comments`,`user` where commentuserid = #{userid} and comments.commentuserid = user.userid
